00005 #include "ral_mux.h"
00006 #include "AAL/aal_gpio.h"
00007 
00020 struct Mux_Struct* Mux_Init(struct Mux_Struct* Mux, int EN, int gpio[4]){ 
00021         int i;
00022         Mux->EN = EN;
00023         GPIO_Init(EN,OUTPUT);
00024         for(i=0;i<4;i++){
00025                 Mux->gpio[i] = gpio[i];
00026                 GPIO_Init(gpio[i], OUTPUT);
00027         }
00028         Mux_Unset(Mux);//deactive the mux(select no output)
00029         return Mux;
00030 }
00031 
00040 void Mux_Set(struct Mux_Struct* Mux, int channel){
00041         channel &= 0x0F;
00042         (channel&0x08) ? GPIO_Set(Mux->gpio[0],1) : GPIO_Set(Mux->gpio[0],0);
00043         (channel&0x04) ? GPIO_Set(Mux->gpio[1],1) : GPIO_Set(Mux->gpio[1],0);
00044         (channel&0x02) ? GPIO_Set(Mux->gpio[2],1) : GPIO_Set(Mux->gpio[2],0);
00045         (channel&0x01) ? GPIO_Set(Mux->gpio[3],1) : GPIO_Set(Mux->gpio[3],0);
00046         // active the mux                       
00047         GPIO_Set(Mux->EN,0); //clear not_EN
00048 }
00049 
00055 void Mux_Unset(struct Mux_Struct* Mux){
00056         // deactive the mux                     
00057         GPIO_Set(Mux->EN,1); //set not_EN
00058         return ;
00059 }
